Useage: General cartography; maps that require shape accuracy

Distortion: distortion increases outside of each zone
Useage: Large-scale maps (specific states, counties, cities, etc.)

Distortion: less distortion at mid-latitudes but still high near poles
Useage: Web mapping for direction (used by Google Maps, OpenStreetMap)

a good general purpose projection for the State of Montana; Albers Equal Area Conic projection; works best for mapping the entire state (wider east-west areas)
optimizes area for Zone 11N; works best for narrower longitudincal bands (focuss on specific counties)
optimizes area for Zone 12N; works best for narrower longitudincal bands (focuss on specific counties)
